description:
Running bzr551

When running nova-manage to create users and projects, a superfluous warning is emitted:
No handlers could be found for logger "nova.auth.manager"

ttx@magellan:~$ sudo nova-manage network create 10.0.0.0/8 1 64
ttx@magellan:~$ sudo nova-manage user admin ttx
No handlers could be found for logger "nova.auth.manager"
export EC2_ACCESS_KEY=3d2ae273-6d35-4e7d-af8a-b38ed88d2aa7
export EC2_SECRET_KEY=376eaafe-e779-4f54-89e8-d74ac2c3707c
ttx@magellan:~$ sudo nova-manage project create IRT ttx
No handlers could be found for logger "nova.auth.manager"
ttx@magellan:~$
title: Logging handler warning when running nova-manage

comments.content:
Running bzr551

When running nova-manage to create users and projects, a superfluous warning is emitted:
No handlers could be found for logger "nova.auth.manager"

ttx@magellan:~$ sudo nova-manage network create 10.0.0.0/8 1 64
ttx@magellan:~$ sudo nova-manage user admin ttx
No handlers could be found for logger "nova.auth.manager"
export EC2_ACCESS_KEY=3d2ae273-6d35-4e7d-af8a-b38ed88d2aa7
export EC2_SECRET_KEY=376eaafe-e779-4f54-89e8-d74ac2c3707c
ttx@magellan:~$ sudo nova-manage project create IRT ttx
No handlers could be found for logger "nova.auth.manager"
ttx@magellan:~$
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
